title: The Forgotten Templars II: The Shield and The lost Ship
description: Drew De Bleek and Gabriella Fruilli continue the quest to find the Knights Templar artifacts. Hunted by the 37th and now forced to fight back. What did happen to The Salvatore? Can they find the LordsHeads, do they even exist? Follow their searches. Can they stay true to their beliefs? What has the Pope given up and why?
author: M. Caldwell Hunter
